job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Remote eventually will have to relocate to Denver, CO or Memphis, TN<br><br>Position will be temporarily remote from home until AHS returns to office.<br><br>CandidatesMUSTbe located in the Memphis, TN area OR Denver, CO area.<br><br><strong><u>Quick Notes From Interview<br><br></u></strong>George Stragand - Manager of the team<br><ul><li>Newer to AHS - just started 2 1/2 weeks ago</li><li>Lives in colorado</li></ul> 6 currently on the team and looking to double size<br><br>Gitlab used a lot<br><br>On call every once in a while and rotates through each team member<br><br>A lot of work within the cloud<br><br><strong><u>He Asked About Security Experience<br><br></u></strong>What is the owasp top 10 and which would you go after first?<br><br><strong><u>What He Would Like To See<br><br></u></strong>Heavy focus on the networking stuff<br><br>VPC<br><br>Networking<br><br>Routing is a bigger deal<br><br>Unicorn- someone with servicemesh experience Hashicorp is one<br><br><strong>Istio - they're currently using <br><br></strong><strong>Anthos - they're currently using</strong>
